properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 29 at 3:42PM AKST until March 2 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected with areas of poor visibility. Plan on
difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12
inches are expected south of Trims Camp, with 2 to 4 inches of
snow north of Trims Camp. South winds gusting to 60 mph along
with blowing snow are expected tonight and Sunday morning from
Black Rapids north.

* WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range.

* WHEN...Midnight to 3 PM Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to develop late tonight
south of Trims Camp and continue through Monday. South winds
gusting to 60 mph and blowing snow are expected to develop late
tonight north of Trims Camp, and continue through Sunday
morning. After winds decrease Sunday afternoon, snow will
develop north of Trims Camp and winds will turn north. Total
snow accumulations of 8 to 12 are expected south of Trims Camp,
with 2 to 4 inches of snow north of Trims Camp.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The
latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM AKST MONDAY
